title: Chana masala (Chickpea curry)
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '1 (2cm) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped, or more to taste', '1 green chilli pepper, seeded and chopped (optional)', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 bay leaves, or more to taste', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 pinch salt to taste', 'water as needed', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas', '1 teaspoon fresh coriander leaves, for garnish, or more to taste']
